overview: For this film, Chris Paul Daniels has sourced 70 different films from the North West Film Archive at Manchester Metropolitan University to create a monumental study of cultural traditions, procession and ceremony. Guided by the unseen presence of a disembodied voice, the artistâ€™s fictional script is accompanied with an original musical score composed by Graham Massey (808 State, Massonix).
title: Is there anybody there?
